author: Odeinoichus
title: Not the Atomic Wedgie!
review:
Set #71009 Martin Prince: Beware the Bully, for now Nelson has someone to give a Wedgie too.

Martin Prince is one of those characters many fans enjoy and his LEGO version captures that likeness quite well. With a short sleeved white shirt, including a pocket with pens and dual molded arms, he has short legs with orange shorts and shoes, dual molded of course not printed. And he comes with a large book, larger than he is tall almost titled Coping with a High IQ.

Overall Martin's one of the better offerings from this series, if only because it's nice to get so many Children to populate Springfield, although at this point we've only got Bart, Lisa, Milhouse, Martin, Ralph and Nelson, but still it's nice to see so many short legged characters with new short legs for MOM builders. Definitely recommend picking this puppy up.
